commands.name: encode
commands.title: Encode
commands.subtitle: URL/Base64/Hex Encoding
commands.description: Encode text using URL, Base64, or Hex encoding

commands.name: decode
commands.title: Decode
commands.subtitle: URL/Base64/Hex/Unicode Decoding
commands.description: Decode text using URL, Base64, Hex, or Unicode decoding

commands.name: uuid
commands.title: UUID Generator
commands.subtitle: Generate UUID v4 & v7
commands.description: Generate single or batch UUID v4 and v7 strings

commands.name: typeid
commands.title: TypeID
commands.subtitle: TypeID Encode/Decode
commands.description: Encode UUIDs to TypeIDs and decode TypeIDs back to UUIDs

commands.name: datetime
commands.title: DateTime
commands.subtitle: Timestamp & Date Conversion
commands.description: Convert between timestamps and ISO dates

commands.name: filesize
commands.title: File Size
commands.subtitle: Bytes & Human Readable Conversion
commands.description: Convert between bytes and human-readable file sizes

commands.name: ip-lookup
commands.title: IP Lookup
commands.subtitle: IP Address Information
commands.description: Get detailed information about IP addresses

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
